name: Super Mario Galaxy World
description:
A 2D take on Super Mario Galaxy. Play as Mario and collect all the coins to win!

Use a and d to move around, and space to jump.

This game is a part of the MFGG 5 Fangame Jam and was completed over the course of 5 days. All audio is pulled from Super Mario Galaxy, and the Mario and coin sprites are from Super Mario World. I claim no ownership of the Mario Franchise, nor any characters or games affiliated with it.
